pageHeader.titleMain: Relaunch of the new Honda NSX Supercar
pageHeader.subtitle: >- Honda launched the released its new supercar. I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to develop the presentation layer that was added to the existing Honda website backend.
pageHeader.description: > Honda launched the released its new supercar. I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to develop the presentation layer that was added to the existing Honda website backend.  Honda's latest supercar incarnation, the venerable Honda NSX, was being released. The website to mark the occasion was designed by Razorfish in Los Angeles. I joined the team to do the front-end development and the visual presentation layer for this subsection of the Honda USA website.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
